posts.post_content: They have been making better and better blue "removal" spells over the years. From [dehydration](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=dehydration) to [frozen solid](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=frozen solid) to [glimmerdust nap](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=glimmerdust nap) to [curse of chains](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=curse of chains) to [paralyzing grasp](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=paralyzing grasp) to [narcolepsy](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=narcolepsy). I think this one is the best because it taps it as well as keeps it tapped down. So you can attack past on the turn you play.
posts.html:
They have been making better and better blue "removal" spells over the years. From dehydration to frozen solid to glimmerdust nap to curse of chains to paralyzing grasp to narcolepsy. I think this one is the best because it taps it as well as keeps it tapped down. So you can attack past on the turn you play.
